data.title: Gajakesari Kannada movie review
data.meta_description: Gajakesari Kannada movie review rating, The much awaited Kannada movie Gajakesari starring Yash hit theatres on Friday.
data.text:
The much awaited Kannada movie Gajakesari starring Yash hit theatres on Friday.

Before we tell you reasons to watch or not watch the movie, let's take a look at the production crew.

Directed by Krishna

Produced by Jayanna, Yogendra

Screenplay by Krishna

Starring Yash, Amulya, Ananth Nag, Shahbaz Khan

Music by V. Harikrishna

Cinematography Satya Hegde

Studio Jayanna Combines

Here are things you must know about the movie before you book your tickets

Gajakesari stars Yash and Amulya in the lead roles

Gajakesari is the fifth film made with Yash and producers Jayanna and Bogendra

The movie has done great business even before its release

According to the latest buzz doing the rounds in the Gandhinagar, the dubbing rights of the film in Hindi have been sold for a whopping Rs 1.50 crore.

The satellite rights of Gajakesari fetched Rs 4.50 crore, which is almost double the price of his earlier film Googly, which earned Rs 1.95 crore

The movie will be released in nearly 175 theatres

According to producer Jayanna, Gajakesari will become a milestone in Sandalwood and set new benchmarks in the Kannada film industry.

Cinematographer Krishna who turned director with this film, has used all types of cameras including GoPro, 5D, 7D, Red Epic, Alexa and Sony F 65. Gajakesari has been shot 70 per cent on negative, which is a two-hour-forty-minute-film.

Watch the movie to find out more...

We will soon be back with the report on box office collection. So, come back for all the movie updates. In the meantime check out this trailer
